entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
